%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.expression: IF(%LDLifeDisabilityWaiveBlock|n:LDCoverageDescription% == "LDPrdBasicLife","Basic Life and AD&D",IF(%LDLifeDisabilityWaiveBlock|n:LDCoverageDescription% == "LDPrdBasicDependent","Basic Dependent Life",IF(%LDLifeDisabilityWaiveBlock|n:LDCoverageDescription% == "LDPrdOptionalLife","Optional Supplemental/Voluntary Life and AD&D",IF(%LDLifeDisabilityWaiveBlock|n:LDCoverageDescription% == "LDPrdOptionalDependent","Optional Supplemental/Voluntary Dependent Life",IF(%LDLifeDisabilityWaiveBlock|n:LDCoverageDescription% == "DisabilityPrdShort","Short Term Disability",IF(%LDLifeDisabilityWaiveBlock|n:LDCoverageDescription% == "DisabilityPrdLong","Long Term Disability",IF(%LDLifeDisabilityWaiveBlock|n:LDCoverageDescription% == "DisabilityPrdVoluntaryShort","Voluntary Short Term Disability",IF(%LDLifeDisabilityWaiveBlock|n:LDCoverageDescription% == "DisabilityPrdVoluntaryLong","Voluntary Long Term Disability"))))))))
